Some photographs of critters from the field and wandering around California

#\newline 

<link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css" type="text/css">

<img src="images/weddell.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A weddell seal (*Leptonychotes weddellii*) naps on an iceberg near Port Charcot, Western Antarctic Peninsula.

#\newline 

<img src="images/rufous.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A rufous hummingbird (*Selasphorus rufus*) spotted in the Del Monte Forest, CA.

#\newline  

<img src="images/kite.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A white-tailed kite (*Elanus leucurus*) hunts at dusk over an open field in Stanford, CA.

#\newline  

<img src="images/warbler.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
An adventurous Townsend's warbler (*Setophaga townsendi*) joins the team for some blue whale tagging offshore in Monterey Bay, CA.

#\newline 

<img src="images/gopher.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A Botta's pocket gopher (*Thomomys bottae*) emerges from its burrow in Stanford, CA, wary of potential predators.

#\newline 

<img src="images/gentoo.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A gentoo penguin (*Pygoscelis papua*) surfaces for a breath along the Western Antarctic Peninsula.


#\newline 

<img src="images/rhino2.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A white rhinoceros (*Ceratotherium simum*) grazes just before sundown in Namibia.

#\newline 

<img src="images/Chelonia_Fregata.tiff" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A magnificent frigatebird (*Fregata magnificens*) looks to score a meal of bait fish aggregated beneath a green turtle (*Chelonia mydas*) in the Eastern Tropical Pacific.

#\newline  

<img src="images/wilsons.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A Wilson's storm petrel (*Oceanites oceanicus*) navigates the dynamic habitat of an Antarctic Peninsula bay.

#\newline 

<img src="images/albatross.jpg" style="width:100%; border:1px solid; margin-right: 20px" align="left">
A black-footed albatross (*Phoebastria nigripes*) glides over the rolling swell of Monterey Bay, CA.
